block.p: LEAD: Writers on Writing, a free lecture series sponsored by Barnard College, will conclude on Wednesday at 8:15 P.M. with readings by Ann Birstein, author of ''Last of the True Believers'' and other works, and David Ignatow, a poet and author of ''The One in the Many: Literary Memoirs.'' Another reading sponsored by the college, featuring Arnold Weinstein, a playwright and author, is scheduled for June 25 at 8:15 P.M.
